JobFullDesc: Facebook Financial (known internally as “F2”) is a newly formed product group at Facebook focused on building products to make payments and financial services simpler, for everyone, and secure across our apps. We want to empower people everywhere to send money to each other, give them the confidence to buy and sell things online, and help businesses grow.This role will oversee the F2 Business Operations team, which supports F2 leadership with strategic and analytical support for monetization and long-term investment decisions across areas such as Novi, our new digital wallet and the Payments product team. We provide an objective finance point of view by developing structured frameworks, finding data and synthesizing it into actionable insights, and building rigorous financial models. We focus on using our unique view into the numbers to see trends and opportunities that are developing within the company as well as across the industry. You will gain invaluable experience in a position that offers significant responsibility and interaction with leadership, as well as considerable opportunity to have a large impact within a growing Finance organization. Successful candidates for this team will have a bias towards action, exceptional partnership and communication skills, and know-how to balance getting the details right while still moving fast.
